Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Param: Total Vendors Imported:1; Total Annual Spend Imported: $287.18

Keyword.Name: AdminEditVendorVCardOnBoarding
Keyword.Description: Edit Vendor from Virtual Card Onboarding config

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sVendorMetadata
Param.Description: validate Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Param.Name: sServiceRequired
Param.Description: validate Service Required, use short name Remittance/Pay4You or full name

Keyword.Name: AdminAddUpdateACHInformationVCO
Keyword.Description: Edit Vendor from Virtual Card Onboarding config

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sVendorMetadataCurrent
Param.Description: edit Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Param.Name: sVendorMetadataUpdate
Param.Description: edit Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Param.Name: sVendorMetadataRemit
Param.Description: edit Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Param.Name: sVendorMetadataContact
Param.Description: edit Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: edit Vendor Address1-2-3,city,state, zipcode. Use format: AddressLine1 = 147 VVT;City=NewYork;State = NC; ZipCode=00997;

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser
